description: Quite possibly one of the nicest trails in Prince George. Mostly single track with a few climbs up to the highest point on Cranbrook hill. A must do.Follow a ridge from the Forest for the World parking lot to the 2km marker on the Prince George Greenway trail.
directions: The trail is accessed from the Forest for the World Parking lot at the south end of Kueng Road on Cranbrook Hill in Prince George.
title: Fir Ridge
